text: Najam Hussain Syed also spelt Najm Hosain Syed (born 1936) is a Punjabi play- writer, poet, and criticZubair Ahmed, 'Najam Hussain Syed: A Critical View' in Journal of Punjabi Studies, Lahore, Vol 13, Spring 2006, p 263 who lives in Lahore, Pakistan. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Punjabi people Category:Writers from Lahore Category:Pakistani poets
title: Najam Hussain Syed
